programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Kanta Serigala
programme.desc: seorang abang yang cuba membalas dendam atas kematian adiknya. programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Dari Empang Kok Jadi Sayang
programme.desc: Mila dan Anton sama-sama menjual ikan Gurame. Mereka sering bertengkar kerana berebut pelanggan, tetapi lama kelamaan mereka mulai memiliki perasaan antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep179
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep37
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jagoan Karaoke Indonesia Ep1
programme.desc: Cara yang menyeronokkan dan unik untuk menganjurkan pertandingan streaming Karaoke. Peserta dari pelbagai destinasi mengambil bahagian untuk menang.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep146
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep180
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Berkah Dari Berbuat Baik Pada Wanita Yang Gemar Pamer Harta
programme.desc: Yuni yang sentiasa dimanja oleh suaminya menjadi seseorang yang gemar mempamerkan perhiasan kepada orang lain. Sebaliknya, sepupunya yang bernama Sulis hidup dengan sederhana dan bahkan rela hidup sebagai janda. Anehnya, Yuni tidak menyukai Sulis dan selalu berlaku jahat terhadap Sulis. Tetapi Sulis menerima semua perlakuan itu dengan ikhlas dan sabar.

programme.title: Pelangi Untuk Nirmala Ep34
programme.desc: Persahabatan antara dua orang gadis, Pelangi dan Nirmala. Namun, persahabatan mereka ditentang oleh orang tua mereka kerana perbezaan strata sosial. Pelangi hidup dengan sederhana, sementara Nirmala hidup mewah.

programme.title: Temu Lawak Ep2
programme.desc: Temu Lawak adalah rancangan komedi dengan kumpulan legenda Srimulat yang akan membuat kemunculan semula melalui rancangan ini. Turut dimeriahkan oleh ramai pelawak dan artis undangan. Di Temu Lawak, pelawak bersatu kembali dengan kisah kontemporari yang dibalut dengan komedi gaya Srimulat.

programme.title: LIDA 2021 Ep2

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep146
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Pelangi Untuk Nirmala Ep34
programme.desc: Persahabatan antara dua orang gadis, Pelangi dan Nirmala. Namun, persahabatan mereka ditentang oleh orang tua mereka kerana perbezaan strata sosial. Pelangi hidup dengan sederhana, sementara Nirmala hidup mewah.

programme.title: Temu Lawak Ep2
programme.desc: Temu Lawak adalah rancangan komedi dengan kumpulan legenda Srimulat yang akan membuat kemunculan semula melalui rancangan ini. Turut dimeriahkan oleh ramai pelawak dan artis undangan. Di Temu Lawak, pelawak bersatu kembali dengan kisah kontemporari yang dibalut dengan komedi gaya Srimulat.

programme.title: Berkah Dari Berbuat Baik Pada Wanita Yang Gemar Pamer Harta
programme.desc: Yuni yang sentiasa dimanja oleh suaminya menjadi seseorang yang gemar mempamerkan perhiasan kepada orang lain. Sebaliknya, sepupunya yang bernama Sulis hidup dengan sederhana dan bahkan rela hidup sebagai janda. Anehnya, Yuni tidak menyukai Sulis dan selalu berlaku jahat terhadap Sulis. Tetapi Sulis menerima semua perlakuan itu dengan ikhlas dan sabar.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep180
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep38
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.desc: Penampilan istimewa bintang-bintang muda keluarga Indosiar mempersembahkan pelbagai kisah dari romantik hingga menyeramkan.

programme.title: Trauma Cinta
programme.desc: Denisa seorang wanita cantik yang terpaksa bekerja keras dan menunaikan amanah arwah ibu bapanya untuk menjaga syarikat. Selain itu, Denisa juga mempunyai teman lelaki bernama Gamal. Mereka berdua sudah lama menjalinkan hubungan dan bertunang.

programme.title: Da Capo
programme.desc: A frustrated songwriter met his old bandmate and a school band "Destroyer", who inspired him to complete an unfinished track...

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: With her sister murdered in cold blood, she goes after the killer for revenge, not knowing she's a target herself.

programme.title: Tazza: One Eyed Jack
programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: Set Me Free
programme.desc: Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Come Rain, Come Shine
programme.desc: On their last day together, a married couple is still unable to articulate their true feelings for each other and linger on their relationship.

programme.title: Sympathy For Lady Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman planned revenge against her teacher after being wrongfully imprisoned for 13 years.

programme.title: Youngju
programme.desc: Young-Ju, barely 18 years old, works to support her younger brother after her parents died. She decides to meet the people responsible for her parents' deaths when she needs financial help.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: For The Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Min-jun and Ji-won are first-rate "players" who are used to getting their way in the field of love and sex -- until they run into each other.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Diva
programme.desc: A diving diva submerges into an unknown depth of fear after getting into a terrible car accident with her best friend.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.desc: During the extradition to Korea, a group of dangerous criminals united to stage an escape from the floating prison.

programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep145146
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep171
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3673
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47014702
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep171
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep147148
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1051
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep113
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player(M) Ep4950
programme.desc: Chin-Lan Chang & Top Social Media Infulencer travel & explore Taichong!

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep463
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep78
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues as it follows four couples who meet through a dating website. Four men go on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Shen and Wong Fei Hungs relationship turns sour, and Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhous favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his fathers martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: New Tales of the Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth...

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.desc: Q & A - Ensign Spock's (Ethan Peck) first day aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise doesn't go as planned when he and Number One (Rebecca Romijn) are unexpectedly stuck together in a turbo lift.

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: The story of an intelligent, heroic collie and his young owner, previously featured in numerous films and a successful 1950s television series, was updated for the 1990s in this family feature.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show S3 Ep77
programme.desc: Actress and Director Elizabeth Banks reveals behind the scenes secrets about some of her most famous films and shares why her new film 'Call Jane' is so important to her.

programme.title: Children of a Lesser God
programme.desc: Based on the hit Broadway play, it's the uplifting love story of John Leeds, an idealistic special education teacher, and a headstrong deaf girl named Sarah.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live S48 Ep15
programme.desc: Jenna Ortega - Your host tonight Jenna Ortega.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep71
programme.desc: While a woman is on a European cruise, one of her dogs burrows under the pet sitter's fence and is hit by a car. When a woman sues her ex-friend for excessive mileage on a leased car.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep72
programme.desc: After a night of drinking, two women end up fighting over alleged slander and boys. A woman sues her ex-business partner for damages resulting from the dissolution of their alleged partnership in a salon.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep73
programme.desc: A bride's unhappiness with her dress appears on the local news and is accused of deceptive and vindictive slander. A woman vents her friend about her financial troubles after a hit and run.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Stolen Valor - Pride travels to Afghanistan after the lead suspect in a murder case is found with the Navy-issued jacket of an officer believed to have been killed in the line of duty.

programme.title: Crawl
programme.desc: As a hurricane tears through Florida, Haley rushes to find her father, who is injured and trapped in the crawl space of their home. They face an even bigger threat lurking below the surface.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Ray Ferrier is a divorced dockworker and estranged from his two children of whom he has custody on weekends.

programme.title: A Royal Winter
programme.desc: While on a last-minute European holiday, a young woman finds herself in the middle of a real-life fairy tale when a chance meeting with a handsome local leads to something more.

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: A young couple (Ben Stiller and Drew Barrymore) have a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in a perfect New York neighbourhood. All they have to do is bump off a cute little old lady. (2003)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

programme.title: Alternatino with Arturo Castro S1
programme.desc: The Quince - Arturo volunteers to plan his niece's quinceanera, a street tough proves that he has OG cred, and a party guest makes everyone miserable.

programme.title: Young Adult
programme.desc: A divorced writer from the Midwest returns to her hometown to reconnect with an old flame, who's now married with a family.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live S48 Ep15
programme.desc: Jenna Ortega / The 1975 - Guest host Jenna Ortega with musical performance by The 1975.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A familys holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Zagros
programme.desc: In Kurdistan, Zagross happy marriage falters when relatives start questioning his wifes growing modern personality. She soon runs away to Brussels for refuge. He follows her out of love but the burden of tradition and patriarchy never leaves him.

programme.title: Symphony Of The Office
programme.desc: Stuck in a monotonous job with an annoying boss, his colleague Bella is the only reason making Christopher stay. But when she is offered a job elsewhere, Christopher must come to terms with his feelings for her before she leaves.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Girl Who Loved To Laugh
programme.desc: Marie Husler, the girl with Down syndrome, mysteriously disappeared before her 18th birthday. 15 years later, her wax corpse is found in Lake Constance, weighed down with iron chains, and two commissioners are called upon to investigate the mystery.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
programme.desc: In Tuscany, Polish Nobel Prize winner Maria's stable family life begins to erode as her relationship with a young immigrant develops against a backdrop of terrorism and eroding democracy.

programme.title: Black Bread
programme.desc: Best Film winner at the Goya Awards, 2011, Black Bread unfolds in post-war Catalonia. A young boy discovers the bodies of a man and a boy in the woods and his father is blamed for the deaths. To clear his fathers name, he must find the real killers.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil’s Moor
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Return
programme.desc: A man is found dead with a gunshot to his head, the bullet belonging to detective Hanna Zeiler, who is found unconscious next to him. Detective Oberlnder presumes murder, and their relationship is put to the test as he makes a life-changing decision.

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the nave Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: Birth Of A Champion
programme.desc: In 1984 Germany, a hot-headed teenage Boris Becker has but one goal: to play tennis in the big leagues, and to be the best at it. Despite his temper, he is scouted by coach Gnther Bosch, who sees the future Wimbledon champion for what he is.

programme.title: Death Comes to Venice
programme.desc: When an art conservator mysteriously drowns in the Canale dei Marani in Venice, his widow Anna investigates the suspicious circumstances of his death. In the course of doing so, she is led into a jungle of lies, fraud, and art theft.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid

programme.title: The Last Stop
programme.desc: A lone Commuter trapped in a speeding train has to push against the force of the speed and escape before it crashes into the LAST STOP.

programme.desc: A young woman struggles to accept the personality changes her grandmother is going through as she ages.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 1

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 10
programme.desc: While Carlos talks through a personal problem, it gives Latika a new idea, which leads to an unexpected ally.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 2

programme.desc: Posing as a technician, Michael literally "gets the bug out" of a customer's phone and has him convinced it was in there all along. programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: "Choosing not to believe in the devil won't protect you from him." Academy Award winner Anthony Hopkins stars in this supernatural thriller that reveals the devil's reach to even one of the holiest places on earth. Inspired by true events chronicled by Rome-based journalist Matt Baglio, this exorcism drama follows a skeptical seminary student (Colin O'Donoghue) attending an exorcism school at the Vatican. While in Rome, he's sent to apprentice with an unorthodox priest (Hopkins) who introduces him to the darker side of his faith. Also starring I Am Legend's Alice Braga, Rome's Ciarn Hinds, Harry Potter's Toby Jones and Blade Runner's Rutger Hauer, this haunting chiller demonstrates how a disillusioned young priest ultimately finds his true faith by facing pure evil.

programme.desc: It's an end and a beginning in part 2 of the series finale, as Penny & Leonard try to keep a secret, Raj makes a new friend, and the gang travels together into an uncharted future.

programme.title: Friends S8 10
programme.desc: Chandler becomes upset when Monica spends a fortune on a luxurious pair of black boots.

programme.title: Gotham S1 10
programme.desc: Selina leads a new friend on a perilous journey through Gotham to evade the assassins on her trail. And Gordon is reassigned to duty at Arkham Asylum following a misstep.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 5
programme.desc: As Pat and Courtney clash over their next steps in their search for Eclipso, ominous weather conditions in Blue Valley hint that he may be near.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 2
programme.desc: Posing as a cashier, Michael makes a shopper's face appear on a milk carton and tries to convince her that she really is a missing person. Then, in a shipping store he has customers believing that impossible technology of the future has arrived, likea bowling ball that can be mailed in a flat box. Plus, he has a hotel guest questioning her identity when he swaps her ID, and stumps a valet when he does a disappearing act from his car.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 07
programme.desc: As Riggs & Murtaugh examine the murder of one of L.A.'s fashion expeditors, they follow a trail of evidence that leads them to a dangerous underground investigation by the D.E.A.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 5
programme.desc: As Pat and Courtney clash over their next steps in their search for Eclipso, ominous weather conditions in Blue Valley hint that he may be near.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 03
programme.desc: Riggs & Murtaugh follow a violent case involving a drug cartel, theft, two killings and, unfortunately, Murtaugh's old Training Officer, leaving Murtaugh with a difficult decision.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 04
programme.desc: A string of neighborhood burglaries hits close to home for Murtaugh, and it gets personal for Riggs when another break-in ends in a casualty.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 05
programme.desc: While Murtaugh delves deep into the psyche of a Navy SEAL wanted for criminal activity, Riggs' connection to the suspect threatens to interfere with the case, and open up to Murtaugh.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 06

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 07
programme.desc: As Riggs & Murtaugh examine the murder of one of L.A.'s fashion expeditors, they follow a trail of evidence that leads them to a dangerous underground investigation by the D.E.A.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 11
programme.desc: Brandon goes out on a limb, and finds himself sinking in quicksand with no help from Lori - will Desert Dan lend him a hand? Dan's car smarts come in handy, while T Money rocks out with his win. Will Scott and Chrissy climb to the top, or fall hard in today's auction?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 13
programme.desc: Sean holds a one of a kind auction in Malibu, at the Rolls Royce of storage facilities. T Money needs a robot -- but does that mean he'll get it? Jesse draws on his pinball skills to outwit his competitors, while Brandon and Lori take one of the biggest gambles of their career. Will it pay off with an unbelievable score, or will they be crying all the way to the bank?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 1
programme.desc: Posing as a technician, Michael literally "gets the bug out" of a customer's phone and has him convinced it was in there all along. Then, as a seemingly ordinary bartender, he makes patrons fall for a never-ending beer bottle and a shot that breaks the laws of physics. Plus, he infiltrates an office and has gullible coworkers believing that he can freeze-dry animals and reanimate them.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 20
programme.desc: While Penny encourages Leonard to stand up for himself in a physics study, Raj is worried after publishing a paper suggesting he may have discovered alien life.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 21

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 22
programme.desc: Leonard is pleasantly surprised when his mother (CHRISTINE BARANSKI) visits and is genuinely kind toward him - until he finds out the real reason she's there.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 23

programme.desc: Q, Murr, Sal, and Joe provide a false sense of security to some sassy shoppers at a drug store, and the competition reaches new heights during a rematch of their balloon challenge in the grocery store. And tonight the guys laugh and cry their way through the first ever permanent punishment!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 11
programme.desc: The guys cannonball into an uncomfortable poolside encounter, and convince strangers to press send on their absurd e-mails. Later, tonight's loser presents a shocking senior citizen initiative to a community planning board.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 12

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honorable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organized crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armored suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep12
programme.desc: Birthday Girls, The - A pregnant cow with a shrapnel injury is brought into the M*A*S*H unit by her owner for her delivery. Hot Lips celebrates her birthday by going to Tokyo for a date with a General. In Hot Lips absence, Charles instructs the nurses on proper use of a drug, which he does in exchange for a classical record. When complications arise for the pregnant cow, Levophed, a new drug, makes the delivery possible. Charles, being the authority on the use of the drug, must demonstrate on the cow while the nurses watch; he is less than thrilled about the operation. Klingers jeep breaks down and Hot Lips is unable to get to the airport for her birthday trip. Klinger later starts a betting pool on the birth of the calf.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Jenny's Grandparents - Jenny's stubborn grandfathers won't set foot in the Willis apartment because of Tom and Helen's mixed marriage, so Jenny and Louise try to orchestrate a meeting on neutral ground - in the Jefferson apartment.

programme.desc: Dark Imaginings - A series of events makes Sam suddenly aware that he is getting older. When hes admitted to the hospital for a problem he associates with the elderly, he begins to panic.

programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part I - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Angels In Vegas - Part 1 - Dean Martin is unnerved by the violent deaths of his closest friends. When showgirl Mary Phillips is killed in a mysterious car crash, the Angels fly to Vegas and go undercover at the Tropicana.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Angels In Vegas - Part 2 - Dean Martin is unnerved by the violent deaths of his closest friends. When showgirl Mary Phillips is killed in a mysterious car crash, the Angels fly to Vegas and go undercover at the Tropicana.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep13
programme.desc: Blood and Guts - Clayton Kibbee, a handsome, worldly and renowned war correspondent, arrives at the 4077th with the intent of doing a story on the six pints of blood donated to the war effort by some of his readers. Kibbee decides to fictionalize the story of the first pint of blood in order to enliven it. When Hawkeye overhears what is going on he is livid, and points out that this is not a glorious escapade. When the fighting moves and the flow of casualties is lessened, a drunken Kibbe steals B.J.s newly restored motorcycle and takes his remaining pints of blood with him in search of more battling and perhaps a more dramatic story for the wire. Kibbee crashes during his alcoholic haze and is so severely injured as to need a pint of his own blood. The irony of the situation is not lost on the unfortunate journalist.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep14
programme.desc: Dependent - After an intruder attacks a mob lawyer, murders his wife and spares his son, Benson and Stabler question their daughter. However her wild night of drunken partying leaves her unable to recall her actions.

programme.desc: The Adventure Of The Illustrious Client - Sir James Damery asks Holmes for help in persuading Violet to end her association with Baron Gruner, a villain who murdered his last wife abroad. Sir James is mysterious about the identity of his client.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Haystack - An overzealous reporter accuses a new mother on television of kidnapping and trying to kill her baby. This turns out to be the last straw for the despondent woman, who promptly commits suicide.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep06
programme.desc: And They Painted Daisies on His Coffin - The complete resources of Five-O are brought to bear when Danny is indicted for murdering an apparently unarmed teenage boy.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep09
programme.desc: Selling Out - When Frasier is lured into doing on-air endorsements, his professional credibility comes under fire.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep09
programme.desc: The Short, Happy Circuit of Aunt Clara - The Stephens are invited to the Tate home to meet a client who manufactures shoes. Darrin agrees to let Aunt Clare babysit when Samantha tells him Aunt Clara is sad because she has lost her boy friend

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep02
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part II - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Angels In Vegas - Part 1 - Dean Martin is unnerved by the violent deaths of his closest friends. When showgirl Mary Phillips is killed in a mysterious car crash, the Angels fly to Vegas and go undercover at the Tropicana.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Angels In Vegas - Part 2 - Dean Martin is unnerved by the violent deaths of his closest friends. When showgirl Mary Phillips is killed in a mysterious car crash, the Angels fly to Vegas and go undercover at the Tropicana.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep13
programme.desc: Blood and Guts - Clayton Kibbee, a handsome, worldly and renowned war correspondent, arrives at the 4077th with the intent of doing a story on the six pints of blood donated to the war effort by some of his readers. Kibbee decides to fictionalize the story of the first pint of blood in order to enliven it. When Hawkeye overhears what is going on he is livid, and points out that this is not a glorious escapade. When the fighting moves and the flow of casualties is lessened, a drunken Kibbe steals B.J.s newly restored motorcycle and takes his remaining pints of blood with him in search of more battling and perhaps a more dramatic story for the wire. Kibbee crashes during his alcoholic haze and is so severely injured as to need a pint of his own blood. The irony of the situation is not lost on the unfortunate journalist.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep12
programme.desc: George's Alibi - During a severe snowstorm, Lionel accidentally dents George's company van, but he won't tell him because he took it without his father's permission. But George later thinks that he himself dented the van in a hit-and-run he thinks he caused.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep20
programme.desc: Save The Last Dance For Me - Carla teams up with her snarly, ex-husband, Nick, to enter a local dance contest. After several arguments during practice they split and she takes Sam as her partner competing against Nick and Loretta.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep02
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part II - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Angels Come Home - A forged cablegram summons Jill to high-speed adventure. A garage explosion spells trouble. Suspicion rests on Jill's fiance Steve Carmody.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Angel On High - Wheelchair-bound Jonathan Stambler learns that Joan Freeman has died in rural Caine's Corners. Bosley and the Angels find Joan's house stripped of evidential materials, and a courthouse fire destroys important documents.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep14
programme.desc: Holy Mess, A - A depressed soldier goes AWOL and ends up at the 4077th in the company of Hawkeye and B.J. They discover that the soldier, Gillis, had just found out his wife was having an affair and acted impetuously. The next morning they take him to Sunday service to talk to Father Mulcahy. When the M.P.s come to arrest Gillis, Father Mulcahy extends him sanctuary. When Potter informs Gillis that the Command Chaplain has decreed that the sanctuary is to be denied in this situation, Gillis pulls a gun, only to be disarmed by a soft-spoken Father Mulcahy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Haystack - An overzealous reporter accuses a new mother on television of kidnapping and trying to kill her baby. This turns out to be the last straw for the despondent woman, who promptly commits suicide.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep12
programme.desc: George's Alibi - During a severe snowstorm, Lionel accidentally dents George's company van, but he won't tell him because he took it without his father's permission. But George later thinks that he himself dented the van in a hit-and-run he thinks he caused.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep07
programme.desc: The Ways of Love - Steve McGarrett has himself committed to a California prison in order to obtain information linking the disappearance of a priceless jewel collection, to the mysterious death of a girl. Knowing his cellmate was the boy friend of the dead girl, McGarrett helps him break out of prison.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep10
programme.desc: I'd Rather Twitch Than Fight - Darrin is furious when Samantha gives his checked sport jacket, bought before he was married, away. Meanwhile, Louise, lectures Samantha on the importance of clothing and the gifts married couples exchange.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Oops - When Frasier contributes to the rumor mill, he causes Bulldog to lose his job.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep16
programme.desc: Philadelphia - When Benson investigates a rape case outside her jurisdiction, she finds herself being questioned by the local Police Captain and although she gets some answers, some are difficult to accept.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep13
programme.desc: George And The Manager - When the manager of one of George's stores quits, longtime employee Emily campaigns to replace him. But George shows his male chauvinism by refusing to consider her because she is a female.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep21
programme.desc: Fear Is My Co-Pilot - When the pilot of a small airplane collapses while in flight, passengers Sam and Diane think they are about to die, and in their panic reveal their true feelings for each other.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep03
programme.desc: Forget Me... Not - The Cleaners kidnap Wyatt and erase his existence, after the child accidentally brings a dragon to life. When Piper, Phoebe and Paige regain their memories they relive the day Wyatt was kidnapped.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep17
programme.desc: My Mother / My Sister - Shelly's visiting mother attempts to pass Shelly off as her older sister; Adam experiences symptoms of sympathetic pregnancy for Eve.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Wake Up Call - Maggie meets an enigmatic stranger; Marilyn's cousin, a healer, observes Joel to learn about conventional medicine; Shelly begins shedding her skin.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Final Frontier - Holling (John Cullum) must confront unresolved feelings when his old nemesis, Jesse the bear, is found dead; an influx of Japanese tourists annoys Maurice (Barry Corbin). With Doug Ballard and Don R. McManus.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep20
programme.desc: It Happened In Juneau - Joel and Maggie (Rob Morrow, Janine Turner) are forced to share a hotel room when she flies him to Juneau for a medical conference; Chris' (John Corbett) brother (Richard Cummings Jr.) returns from Africa.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: The Disappearance of Lady Frances - Watson writes to Holmes telling him of the other guests at his hotel in the Lakes. Sailing back from church across the lake, Lady Frances Carfax falls out of the boat and is rescued by a mysterious person.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: The Problem of Thor Bridge - Maria Gibson, finding only rejection from her husband, arranges to meet the children's Governess, Grace Dunbar, at Thor Bridge. Maria is shot on the bridge and Grace is accused of her murder.

programme.title: Charmed S5 Ep23
programme.desc: Oh My Goddess Part II - Now all-powerful goddesses, the Charmed Ones must try to not be seduced by their new powers and stay focused on vanquishing the Titans before the Titans can destroy all the whitelighters and elders.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep01
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part I - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.desc: Samurai - Five-O goes into action when a Honolulu racket boss, Tokura, runs into serious difficulty with a secret Japanese society. McGarrett must protect Tokura even though he is trying to convict the racket king for his underworld activities.

programme.desc: Twenty-Four Karat Kill - Steve McGarrett and his Five-O crew discover that a fishing boat owner is smuggling gold bars into the islands. Johnny Fargo, owner of the tuna boat, and his brilliant but cynical attorney lead the Five-O unit on a fast chase through downtown Honolulu.

programme.title: Accused Ep8

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: Raiders Of The Lost Ark
programme.desc: Archeologist-adventurer Indiana Jones masterfully vanquishes all manner of foe while in search for the Ark of the Covenant in this action packed adventure. Nominated for 2 Academy Awards including Best Picture.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Temple Of Doom

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Commander - Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Congo to investigate a potentially lethal threat to over two-million people. programme.title: Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Protecting Primates - Today, more than half of the world's primates are under threat of extinction. Meet the scientists making groundbreaking discoveries about this remarkable animal family.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Not Just You - This episode handpicks a bunch of experiences that are common to human beings, no matter what age, lifestyle or cultural background they come from. It makes a great case to prove that - you are not the only one and there are others just like you.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Science of Sport - This episode features the million questions we tend to ask ourselves every time we watch an excellent game of sport, bringing the science behind sporting action.

programme.desc: What is Gravity? - Brian takes us on a tour of gravity, explaining how Sir Isaac Newton devised a simple formula to describe gravity as a force that governs both how apples fall and how planets move in the heavens.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep3
programme.desc: King Kasper - Even orangutans have to watch what they eat. Find out if Beni can stick to a leafy green diet (and stop stealing food). See what kind of tasty treats Lanting can find while skipping class. And watch as Rebecca prepares to return to a truly wild life.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoros highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africas tuskers.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Joined at the Hip - The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan Monkey on a Mission - Rajan is the powerful alpha male who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain such a big group, but the future doesnt look so bright. There are more mouths to feed, and yet his jungle home is shrinking.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Africa's Edens - Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Chobe National Park: Land of Learning - In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africas most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Ugly Cute - Not all baby animals are cute. Often, quirky physical traits are evolutionary adaptations that have helped a species survive. Visit four funny-looking youngsters, including a Baird tapir, two baby gelada baboons, an anteater and a Bactrian camel.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep3
programme.desc: King Kasper - Even orangutans have to watch what they eat. Find out if Beni can stick to a leafy green diet (and stop stealing food). See what kind of tasty treats Lanting can find while skipping class. And watch as Rebecca prepares to return to a truly wild life.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoros highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africas tuskers.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Primate Families - The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Packs - Connect with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the parks edge. Follow Julz as he shares their victories and defeats in this make-or-break season.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Temple Monkeys on the Run - Nestled on the edge of the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a huge troop of Hanuman Langurs, who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. But the troop has a strict hierarchy.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Valley of the Birds - Zambias Luangwa Valley is home to Africas biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds. There are over 400 different species here; each perfectly adapted to exploit every opportunity on offer.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Misfits - Theres watery fun with group two as they visit group threes flooded classroom. Ayu, Ruthie, and Kesi take a step closer to release. And the arrival of Alba - the worlds rarest orangutan - creates a sensation at Orangutan Jungle School.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.
